TopicTitle: Alarm clock and fairing in main game

Articles.Content: i wonder does dev add some day alarm clock and fairing into base game? In my think procedural fairing and Kerbal Alarm Clock are two best mod in the game, aside MechJeb of course:D

they are excellent mods without doubt. but i don't think they should be in the stock game.

fairings are neat, but completely unnecessary with stock aerodynamics. and i think alarm clock hits the same spot as MechJeb, harv once said that he doesn't want to make it too easy for KSP players.
